name: webscraping-ai__webscraping-ai-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation that integrates with WebScraping.AI for web data extraction capabilities.

api_key.title: WebScraping.AI API Key
api_key.description: Your API key from WebScraping.AI. Required for all operations.

default_proxy_type.title: Default Proxy Type
default_proxy_type.description: Default proxy type to use. Can be 'residential' or 'datacenter'.

default_js_rendering.title: Default JavaScript Rendering
default_js_rendering.description: Enable or disable JavaScript rendering by default for all tools.

default_timeout.title: Default Page Timeout (ms)
default_timeout.description: Default maximum web page retrieval time in milliseconds (max: 30000).

default_js_timeout.title: Default JS Timeout (ms)
default_js_timeout.description: Default maximum JavaScript rendering time in milliseconds.
